Villa María Regional Airport  is an airport serving the city of Villa María in the Córdoba Province of Argentina. The airport is  north of Villa María, and replaces the closed Villa María Airport .
Runway length includes a  displaced threshold on Runway 02.
The Marcos Juarez VOR (Ident: MJZ) is located  east-southeast of the airport.
